newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-Heartstream cut by Gruntal.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Heartstream cut by Gruntal.

text.p: -- Gruntal & Co Inc said it cut its rating of Heartstream Inc to neutral from outperform on Tuesday.

-- Heartstream earlier said it expects first quarter revenues of $1.0-$1.3 million, and a net loss per share of $0.35 to $0.38. First Call listed the consensus Wall Street expectation for the quarter at a loss of $0.37.
-- Heartstream said longer-than-expected customer decision-making processes and smaller evaluation orders led to lower-than-anticipated sales during the quarter.
-- The downgrade was based on Heartstream's lower sales ramp projection, but the company's long-term fundamental outlook remains strong, Gruntal analyst Christina Valauri said in a statement.
-- Shares fell three to 7-5/8 and touched a new 52-week low of 7-7/32.
